verses.name: 2 Kings 12:13
verses.text: Howbeit there were not made for the house of the Lord bowls of silver, snuffers, basons, trumpets, any vessels of gold, or vessels of silver, of the money that was brought into the house of the Lord:

verses.name: 2 Kings 12:14
verses.text: But they gave that to the workmen, and repaired therewith the house of the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Kings 12:15
verses.text: Moreover they reckoned not with the men, into whose hand they delivered the money to be bestowed on workmen: for they dealt faithfully.

verses.name: 2 Kings 12:16
verses.text: The trespass money and sin money was not brought into the house of the Lord: it was the priests’.
